00018 // the constructor
00019 FileBuilder::FileBuilder(QDomNode &fileBuilderNode):
00020 BuildModel(fileBuilderNode), fileTypes_(), userFileTypes_() {
00021 
00022         for (int i = 0; i < fileBuilderNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00023                 QDomNode tempNode = fileBuilderNode.childNodes().at(i);
00024 
00025                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:fileType")) {
00026                         fileTypes_.append(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00027                 }
00028                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:userFileType")) {
00029                         userFileTypes_.append(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00030                 }
00031         }
00032         // if mandatory field is missing
00033         if ((fileTypes_.size() == 0) && (userFileTypes_.size() == 0)) {
00034                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr(
00035                                 "No file types found in spirit:fileBuilder"));
00036         }
00037         return;
00038 }
00039

00041 BuildModel(), fileTypes_(), userFileTypes_() {
00042 
00043 }

00046 BuildModel(other),
00047 fileTypes_(other.fileTypes_),
00048 userFileTypes_(other.userFileTypes_) {
00049 }

00051 FileBuilder & FileBuilder::operator=( const FileBuilder &other ) {
00052         if (this != &other) {
00053                 BuildModel::operator=(other);
00054                 fileTypes_ = other.fileTypes_;
00055                 userFileTypes_ = other.userFileTypes_;
00056         }
00057         return *this;
00058 }

00064 void FileBuilder::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00065         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:defaultFileBuilder");
00066 
00067         // atleast one file type must be specified
00068         if ((fileTypes_.size() == 0) && (userFileTypes_.size() == 0)) {
00069                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("No file type specified in spirit:"
00070                                 "defaultFileBuilder"));
00071         }
00072 
00073         for (int i = 0; i < fileTypes_.size(); ++i) {
00074                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:fileType", fileTypes_.at(i));
00075         }
00076 
00077         for (int i = 0; i < userFileTypes_.size(); ++i) {
00078                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:userFileType", userFileTypes_.at(i));
00079         }
00080 
00081         // call the base class write() to write base class information
00082         BuildModel::write(writer);
00083 
00084         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:defaultFileBuilder
00085 }

00105 QString FileBuilder::getFileType() const {
00106         if (!fileTypes_.isEmpty())
00107                 return fileTypes_.first();
00108         else if (!userFileTypes_.isEmpty())
00109                 return userFileTypes_.first();
00110         else
00111                 return QString();
00112 }

00114 void FileBuilder::setFileType( const QString& fileType ) {
00115 
00116         // remove old file types
00117         fileTypes_.clear();
00118 
00119         // if file type is one of the specified by IP-Xact
00120         if ((fileType == QString("asmSource")) ||
00121                 (fileType == QString("cSource")) ||
00122                 (fileType == QString("cppSource")) ||
00123                 (fileType == QString("eSource")) ||
00124                 (fileType == QString("OVASource")) ||
00125                 (fileType == QString("perlSource")) ||
00126                 (fileType == QString("pslSource")) ||
00127                 (fileType == QString("SVASource")) ||
00128                 (fileType == QString("tclSource")) ||
00129                 (fileType == QString("veraSource")) ||
00130                 (fileType == QString("systemCSource")) ||
00131                 (fileType == QString("systemCSource-2.0")) ||
00132                 (fileType == QString("systemCSource-2.0.1")) ||
00133                 (fileType == QString("systemCSource-2.1")) ||
00134                 (fileType == QString("systemCSource-2.2")) ||
00135                 (fileType == QString("systemVerilogSource")) ||
00136                 (fileType == QString("systemVerilogSource-3.0")) ||
00137                 (fileType == QString("systemVerilogSource-3.1")) ||
00138                 (fileType == QString("systemVerilogSource-3.1a")) ||
00139                 (fileType == QString("verilogSource")) ||
00140                 (fileType == QString("verilogSource-95")) ||
00141                 (fileType == QString("verilogSource-2001")) ||
00142                 (fileType == QString("vhdlSource")) ||
00143                 (fileType == QString("vhdlSource-87")) ||
00144                 (fileType == QString("vhdlSource-93")) ||
00145                 (fileType == QString("swObject")) ||
00146                 (fileType == QString("swObjectLibrary")) ||
00147                 (fileType == QString("vhdlBinaryLibrary")) ||
00148                 (fileType == QString("verilogBinaryLibrary")) ||
00149                 (fileType == QString("executableHdl")) ||
00150                 (fileType == QString("unelaboratedHdl")) ||
00151                 (fileType == QString("SDC")) ||
00152                 (fileType == QString("unknown"))) 
00153                 
00154                 fileTypes_.prepend(fileType);
00155         else
00156                 userFileTypes_.prepend(fileType);
00157 }

00159 bool FileBuilder::isValid() const {
00160         // at least one has to have one file type specified
00161         return !(fileTypes_.isEmpty() && userFileTypes_.isEmpty());
00162 }
00163 
00164 bool FileBuilder::hasFileType( const QString& fileType ) const {
00165 
00166         // check all file types
00167         foreach (QString builderFileType, fileTypes_) {
00168                 
00169                 // if match is found
00170                 if (fileType == builderFileType)
00171                         return true;
00172         }
00173         // check all user file types
00174         foreach (QString builderFileType, userFileTypes_) {
00175 
00176                 // if match is found
00177                 if (builderFileType == fileType)
00178                         return true;
00179         }
00180         // no match was found
00181         return false;
00182 }
